name: Eclipse Capella
description: Eclipse Capella is a powerful and extensible MBSE software tool that leverages a field-proven language and method to successfully design the architecture of complex systems.

name: Eclipse Papyrus
description: Eclipse Papyrus is an industrial-grade open source Model-Based Engineering tool. Eclipse Papyrus has notably been used successfuly in industrial projects and is the base platform for several industrial modeling tools.

name: Eclipse RMF
description: RMF is a framework for working with textual requirements, structured as ReqIF models, the industry standard for exchanging requirements. RMF uses natively ReqIF, the open standard for requirements exchange, allowing you to exchange requirements with many industry applications like Rational DOORS® or PTC integrity®.

name: OpenModellica
description: Introduction OPENMODELICA is an open-source Modelica-based1 modeling and simulation environment intended for industrial and academic usage.

name: sphinx-needs
description: Sphinx-needs is a requirements management tool that allows you to manage requirements, specifications, and documentation within Sphinx.
